Package icyllis.arc3d.opengl

Class GLTexture

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.engine.GpuResource
icyllis.arc3d.engine.GpuTexture
icyllis.arc3d.opengl.GLTexture
All Implemented Interfaces:
RefCounted, IGpuSurface, ISurface
Direct Known Subclasses:
GLRenderTexture
public class GLTexture extends GpuTexture
Represents OpenGL 2D textures.

    • getMemorySize

      public long getMemorySize()
      Description copied from class: GpuResource
      Retrieves the amount of GPU memory used by this resource in bytes. It is approximate since we aren't aware of additional padding or copies made by the driver.

      NOTE: The return value must be constant in this object.

      Specified by:
      getMemorySize in class GpuResource
      Returns:
      the amount of GPU memory used in bytes

    • onDiscard

      protected void onDiscard()
      Description copied from class: GpuResource
      Subclass should override this method to invalidate any internal handles, etc. to backend API resources. This may be called when the underlying 3D context is no longer valid and so no backend API calls should be made.
      Overrides:
      onDiscard in class GpuTexture
